attributes.action: abolish the £87,276pa "allowance" unconditionally given to former Prime Ministers regardless of whether it's justified.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unless a former PM becomes Leader of the Opposition - very rare - they automatically receive a Public Duty Costs Allowance of £87,276 per year - indefinitely.

Tony Blair will receive this obscene amount of public money - despite being the best-paid speaker in the world, earning tens-of-millions of £s. It's not necessary and it's not appropriate.
